text: The 2013 African Fencing Championships were held in Cape Town, South Africa from 25 to 29 June. ==Medal summary== ===Men's events=== {| |- |Foil | | | |- |Épée | | | |- |Sabre | | | |- |Team Foil | | | |- |Team Épée | | | |- |Team Sabre | | | |} ===Women's events=== {| |- |Foil | | | |- |Épée | | |} |- |Sabre | | | |- |Team Foil | | | |- |Team Épée | | | |- |Team Sabre | | | |} ===Medal table=== ==References== * Annual Report 2012–13 of the International Fencing Federation 2013 African Fencing Championships Category:International fencing competitions hosted by South Africa Category:2013 in South African sport
title: 2013 African Fencing Championships
